member.name: D3D12_RAYTRACING_AABB
member.summary: Represents an axis-aligned bounding box (AABB) used as raytracing geometry.

member.name: D3D12_RAYTRACING_AABB.MinX
member.summary: The minimum X coordinate of the box.

member.name: D3D12_RAYTRACING_AABB.MinY
member.summary: The minimum Y coordinate of the box.

member.name: D3D12_RAYTRACING_AABB.MinZ
member.summary: The minimum Z coordinate of the box.

member.name: D3D12_RAYTRACING_AABB.MaxX
member.summary: The maximum X coordinate of the box.

member.name: D3D12_RAYTRACING_AABB.MaxY
member.summary: The maximum Y coordinate of the box.

member.name: D3D12_RAYTRACING_AABB.MaxZ
member.summary: The maximum Z coordinate of the box.
